component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
model false org.primefaces.model.MenuModel
An org.primefaces.model.MenuModel instance to build menu dynamically.
visible false java.lang.Boolean false
Sets the menu's visibility, true by default
x false java.lang.Integer -1 Sets the element's "left" style property. Only applies to "dynamic" menus
y false java.lang.Integer -1 Sets the element's "top" style property. Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
fixedCenter false java.lang.Boolean false Boolean value that specifies whether the component should be automatically centered in the viewport on window scroll and resize. Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
constraintToViewport false java.lang.Boolean true
Boolean indicating if the Menu will try to remain inside the boundaries of the size of viewport. Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
position false java.lang.String static
Sets the way menu is placed on the page, when "static" menu is displayed in the normal flow, when set to "dynamic" menu is not on the normal flow allowing overlaying. Default value is "static".
clickToHide false java.lang.Boolean true
Sets the behavior when outside of the menu is clicked, default is false. Only applies to "dynamic" menus
keepOpen false java.lang.Boolean false
Sets the behavior when menu is clicked, default is true. Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
tiered false java.lang.Boolean false
Sets the tiered mode, when set to true menu will be rendered in different tiers, default is false. Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
effect false java.lang.String FADE
Sets the effect for the menu display, default value is FADE. Possible values are "FADE", "SLIDE", "NONE". Use "NONE" to disable animation at all.
effectDuration false java.lang.Double 0.25
Sets the effect for the menu display
autoSubmenuDisplay false java.lang.Boolean true
When set to true, submenus are displayed on mouseover of a menuitem.
showDelay false java.lang.Integer 250
Sets the duration in milliseconds before a submenu is displayed. Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
hideDelay false java.lang.Integer 0
Sets the duration in milliseconds before a menu is hidden Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
submenuHideDelay false java.lang.Integer 250
Sets the duration in milliseconds before a submenu is hidden. Only applies to "dynamic" menus.
context false java.lang.String
Arguments for context sensitive positioning.
style false java.lang.String
Style of the main container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String
Style class of the main container element.
zindex false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE zindex property to control overlapping with other elements
appendToBody false java.lang.Boolean false
